mainText:
Hi.  Just wanted to share my heartfelt condolences with  the family and 
friends of Steve.  Not only was Steve a visionary and a  genius, but also a 
powerful entity.  Though I never had the pleasure  of meeting him, he seemed 
like a special person; a down-to-earth and kind  man, with an incredible 
intellect.  Some of the thoughts and wisdom  that shined during his commencement 
speeches, were very powerful and  truly inspirational.  The world lost a 
good soul, before his  time.  My thoughts go out to everyone that is touched by 
his  unfortunate passing.
author: Bobby
